description: Try our easy to follow Steaks With Mushroom Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Steak,Roast,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Beef,Potato,Mushroom,Soy free,Wheat free,Peanut free
name: Steaks With Mushroom Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Prepare potatoes as per packet instructions. Transfer to tray and cool slightly. Using the palm of your hand, flatten potatoes. Spray well with oil and season. Roast for 25 minutes or until golden and crisp.

Meanwhile, brush steaks on both sides with oil and season. Heat a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook steaks for 2 minutes each side or until browned. Transfer to a plate and cover to keep warm.

Melt butter in pan. Cook onion and garlic for 3 minutes or until tender. Add mushrooms and cook for 10 minutes or until liquid has evaporated. Add cream, sauce, mustard and tarragon. Bring to the boil and simmer for 5 minutes or until sauce has thickened. Season. Serve steaks with potatoes, sauce and steamed beans.
